name: Outsider
stressors: You become imprisoned against your will
You face public mockery or accusation

options.name: Outsider
options.description: You are an outsider, never quite fitting in with established social groups and viewing societies from a perspective that others cannot share. Your position on the margins grants you unique insights and adaptability, though it often leaves you searching for acceptance or purpose. You value independence, authenticity, and adaptability above all else.

options.name: Chameleon
options.description: You have skill with masking the fact that you are an outsider and can often hide yourself in plain sight. Gain +1 to your stealth skill. When rolling a stealth check as part of a group, your stealth check becomes equal to the highest roll of the group.

options.name: Polyglot
options.description: You pick up the local language quickly and make an effort to adapt to local customs. Gain +1 skill with persuasion. Additionally, gain +2 language points.

options.name: Downtime Action : Vanish
options.description: You take some time and scrub any existence or record of your existence in an area, the size of which is determined by a persuasion check; A check of an 6-9 is midly successful and allows you to convince those within a small area like a village or city block, while a 10 or higher is very successful and expands over a large town. On a perfect check, your effort is wide spread and can expand over a larg city.

options.name: Action : Slip Away
options.description: You slip away from combat or a social situation if you are at least a short distance (10 units) away from the nearest enemy and are within 2 units of an object or creature that grants you at least half-cover.

options.name: Reaction : Adapt
options.description: In response to taking damage of the same type you've already taken since the end of your last turn, gain 1d6 mitigation to that type before calculating damage.

options.name: Sovereign Stranger
options.description: Gain +1 talent with social and +1 skill with insight.
